statements: SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT destination, expense_amount FROM travel_expenses ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT destination, travel_date FROM travel_expenses WHERE travel_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, destination FROM travel_expenses WHERE destination LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY travel_date DESC, expense_amount ASC
SELECT destination, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM travel_expenses GROUP BY destination ORDER BY total_expense DESC
SELECT user_id, destination, travel_date, expense_amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT destination) AS unique_destinations FROM travel_expenses
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 AND destination LIKE '%Beach%'
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, expense_type, amount FROM travel_expenses ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT date, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM budget_plan WHERE total_budget > actual_spending
SELECT id, month, total_budget, actual_spending FROM budget_plan
SELECT id, date, expense_type, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Flight' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT month, SUM(total_budget) AS total_budget, SUM(actual_spending) AS total_spending FROM budget_plan GROUP BY month;
SELECT id, amount FROM travel_expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM budget_plan WHERE actual_spending > total_budget ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM TravelExpenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT expense_id, amount FROM TravelExpenses WHERE category = 'Hotel';
SELECT category, amount FROM TravelExpenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT destination_name, country FROM TravelDestinations WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT forecast_id, budget FROM BudgetForecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TravelExpenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT expense_id, amount, date FROM TravelExpenses WHERE category = 'Flight'
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, budget FROM BudgetForecast WHERE budget < 5000
SELECT * FROM TravelDestinations WHERE country = 'France' AND destination_name LIKE '%Paris%'
SELECT * FROM TravelDestinations WHERE country = 'Italy' ORDER BY destination_name ASC
SELECT * FROM TravelExpenses;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM TravelExpenses WHERE total_expense > 1000;
SELECT destination_name, city, avg_expense_per_day FROM TravelDestinations ORDER BY avg_expense_per_day DESC;
SELECT trip_name, total_expense FROM TravelExpenses WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT trip_name, estimated_budget, actual_expenses FROM TravelBudget WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM TravelExpenses WHERE total_expense > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT destination_name, city, country FROM TravelDestinations WHERE avg_expense_per_day < 50 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT year, estimated_budget, actual_expenses FROM TravelBudget WHERE remaining_budget < 5000 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT trip_name, total_expense, end_date FROM TravelExpenses JOIN TravelPlans ON TravelExpenses.id = TravelPlans.trip_id WHERE budget_status = 'Under Budget' ORDER BY total_expense DESC;
SELECT destination_name, city, avg_expense_per_day FROM TravelDestinations WHERE country = 'France' AND city = 'Paris' ORDER BY avg_expense_per_day DESC;
SELECT * FROM TravelExpenses;
SELECT id, destination, expenses FROM TravelHistory WHERE expenses > 1000 ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT destination, expenses FROM TravelExpenses WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT username, age FROM UserProfiles WHERE occupation = 'Engineer' ORDER BY age;
SELECT id, country, climate FROM DestinationDetails WHERE climate = 'Tropical';
SELECT * FROM TravelExpenses ORDER BY travel_date DESC, expenses ASC
SELECT destination, expenses FROM TravelExpenses WHERE expenses > 500 ORDER BY expenses DESC
SELECT user_id, destination, travel_date FROM TravelHistory WHERE destination LIKE '%beach%' AND expenses < 1000
SELECT destination, SUM(expenses) AS total_expenses FROM TravelHistory GROUP BY destination HAVING total_expenses > 2000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC
SELECT u.username, u.email, t.destination, t.expenses FROM UserProfiles u INNER JOIN TravelHistory t ON u.user_id = t.user_id
